statements: SELECT * FROM location_based_marketing;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM location_based_marketing WHERE id = 1;
SELECT customer_phone, customer_location FROM location_based_marketing WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT id, customer_name, customer_email FROM location_based_marketing ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_location FROM location_based_marketing WHERE ST_DISTANCE(customer_location, POINT(40, -73)) < 10;
SELECT id, customer_name, customer_email FROM location_based_marketing WHERE id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, customer_phone FROM location_based_marketing WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM location_based_marketing WHERE customer_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT customer_name, ST_X(customer_location) AS latitude, ST_Y(customer_location) AS longitude FROM location_based_marketing WHERE ST_Distance(customer_location, POINT(37.7749, -122.4194)) < 10;
SELECT customer_email, customer_phone FROM location_based_marketing ORDER BY customer_name DESC, customer_email ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM location_data;
SELECT id, customer_name, latitude, longitude FROM location_data;
SELECT location_id, customer_name FROM location_data WHERE latitude > 30;
SELECT * FROM marketing_data WHERE budget > 1000;
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM marketing_data ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT * FROM location_data WHERE customer_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT id, customer_name, location_id, latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE id > 100 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, target_audience, budget FROM marketing_data WHERE budget > 5000 ORDER BY budget ASC;

SELECT location_data.id, location_data.customer_name, marketing_data.campaign_name, marketing_data.target_audience FROM location_data JOIN marketing_data ON location_data.location_id = marketing_data.location_id;
SELECT customer_name, campaign_name, target_audience, budget FROM location_data LEFT JOIN marketing_data ON location_data.location_id = marketing_data.location_id;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, location_id FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE city = 'New York' AND state = 'NY';

SELECT customer_name, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM customers JOIN customer_interactions ON customers.customer_id = customer_interactions.customer_id ORDER BY interaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE location_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email, locations.city FROM customers JOIN locations ON customers.location_id = locations.location_id;

SELECT customer_name, interaction_type, interaction_timestamp FROM customers JOIN customer_interactions ON customers.customer_id = customer_interactions.customer_id WHERE interaction_type = 'purchase' AND interaction_timestamp >= '2021-01-01';

SELECT customers.customer_name, locations.location_name, locations.city, locations.state FROM customers JOIN locations ON customers.location_id = locations.location_id ORDER BY customers.customer_name ASC, locations.state DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, location_id FROM customers WHERE customer_id=1;
SELECT customer_name, location_id FROM customers ORDER BY location_id DESC;
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM locations WHERE country='USA';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE location_id=2;
SELECT * FROM locations WHERE country='USA';
SELECT customer_name, location_name, city, state FROM customers JOIN locations ON customers.location_id = locations.location_id;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, amount FROM customers JOIN customer_purchase ON customers.customer_id = customer_purchase.customer_id WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, city, state, country FROM customers JOIN locations ON customers.location_id = locations.location_id WHERE country='Canada';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, city, state FROM customers WHERE state='CA';
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT city FROM locations;
SELECT customer_name, city, state, zip_code FROM customers WHERE city='New York';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE state='CA';
SELECT customer_name, city, state FROM customers WHERE zip_code='90210';
SELECT customer_name, address, city, state, zip_code FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;

SELECT customers.customer_name, locations.location_name, campaign_id FROM customers INNER JOIN customer_interactions ON customers.customer_id = customer_interactions.customer_id INNER JOIN locations ON customer_interactions.location_id = locations.location_id WHERE campaign_id=3;

SELECT customer_name, city, state, start_date, end_date FROM customers INNER JOIN customer_interactions ON customers.customer_id = customer_interactions.customer_id INNER JOIN marketing_campaigns ON customer_interactions.campaign_id = marketing_campaigns.campaign_id WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
